name: 10pc Natural Vegan MINERAL PIGMENT Make-Up ASSORTMENT -Pick any Ten FULL SIZED Colors Listed
description:
This listing is for a pick-your-own assortment of any ten full sized crushed mineral pigments listed. Choose any ten colors currently available in my store! A great way to try an assortment for a great price...
www.Back2theearth.com

name: LOST IN TIME- Upcycled STEAMPUNK Assemblage Gears and Cogs NECKLACE
description:
This listing is for a very detailed and completely unique piece that I created in reverence to the Steampunk movement and the mysteries wrapped up within time and the universe. 
This is competely assembled of clock parts and gears entwined with twisted silver metal, and finished off with a glass faux centerpiece 'clock' that refracts from different angles, giving the illusion of appearing to be solid from one angle and smashed from another. This measures about 20" in length, and is finished off with a matching, hand formed twisted metal clasp. If needed, I can add a few links to make this a bit longer for you.
